title: bhavati vishvAsO
sahitya:
bhavati vishvAsO mE bhavatu sadA


anupallavi

  vividha tApaharaNi vIta samshayalEsham


caraNam 1    shrutirAshiSu bhuvanE subahudhAramAkAnta tava vidyamAnESu bahuSu bhinnamatESu 
Itaratra na mE bhUyAdIshE patrapAtO api natapAla yatA tathA nAtha sudrDhamayE
    caraNam 2    vana sancaraNa nadIprataraNa ranAdyAsudhana bhItikarAsuca khalu vipada vastAsu vanajAkSa bhuvana pAvana nO bibhEmi yathAnanu tathA nirapAyO nAradAdi pUjita
    caraNam 3    varada pANDavEyOddha vAkrUrAdayO yEna parama vipadambOdhipAramgatA nUnam
parama vApuriha tE padamapi krpayA tE para cidAnanda shrI padmanAbha murArE
